document.full_text: mo farah of great britain, who had never raced a half marathon, edged gebre gebremariam in the new york city half marathon. caroline rotich of kenya won the women's race.
document.title: newcomer wins new york city half marathon
lines_and_colors: mo farah of great britain, who had never raced a half marathon, edged gebre gebremariam in the new york city half marathon. caroline rotich of kenya won the women's race.
